== Known issues ==
The unofficial AOKP/CM10/PAC device tree made by <nowiki>[[https://github.com/benetnath/android_device_alcatel_cocktail|BENETNATH]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://github.com/bagyusz/android_device_alcatel_cocktail|bagyusz]]</nowiki> are both unacceptable in standards of CM10.1, thus need rebuilding from scratch. 

Currently I am in the process of rewriting the device tree, and as soon as it is finished, I will publish the links, alongside with the first test build.
